description.value:
Perhaps the most stand-out of the agin, quagin appear part way between a fish, a frog, and a turtle, with a fish-like face and gills, a frog-like tongue and webbed toes, and a turtle-like shell and and scales. Beyond this, they feature other features that cannot quite be placed either, like long, flexible tails, and thin fur-like keratin around the wrists and shoulders, and sometimes the ankles or tail.
For these reasons, some believe quagin to be a different species that was absorbed into the agin through generations of gene-mixing, a theory quagin often deny. Quagin often point out the similarities between them and other agin, namely their webbed feet and hands, their fish-like faces, their similar body shape and scale texture, their thin tails, and being fish with natural keratin armor.

In either case, quagin are naturally defended by an impressively impenetrable keratin shell and keratin “furs,” so much so that even quagin hunters find no need for armor. Even if they did, their shelled torso is too rounded for most armor anyway.

system.classDetails:
Quagin Traits

  • Attribute Increase: Your Constitution increases by 1.
  • Trade Proficiency: You have proficiency in the Fishing Trade.
  • Thick Shell: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.3SFEJSNI19GQEGRC]{Thick Shell}
  • Shell Defense: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.KLSTCXF94REGPI8E]{Shell Defense}
  • Natural Conjurer: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.UTARGEU10YNEKEFB]{Natural Conjurer}
